message: I just posted some pictures over at the meetup group http://www.meetup.com/pythonkc/photos/all_photos/?photoAlbumId=1853011
Looks like Convore is not getting a lot of love :-(
Yeah, this site had some serious troubles the day I suggested it. Which kinda sucks, since I think it's pretty good for many forms of discussions.
I like it a lot, I used extensible during PyCon 2011 and it made the conference a blast, I met a lot of people, coordinated lunches, volunteering and drinks
For the record, I'm a big fan of Convore as well. :-)
